metadata.author: Jianqing Wu, Ping Zha
metadata.title: Strategies for Surviving in the Coming Coronaviruses Outbreak
metadata.abstract: The coronaviruses has reached the U.S. The virus causes respiratory infections, but details about the virus and disease are still unknown. Only sound health wisdom is the most important protection against the virus and the disease. We explore strategies for avoiding infections and fighting against the virus after infections. We mainly consider strategical differences on the basis of dynamical properties of virus invasion and reproduction, immune response, organ usable function, and scar formation. Part A is consistent with consensus, but Part B discusses new concepts that have not been recognized in medicine.

Part A is consistent with consensus, but Part B discusses new concepts that have not been recognized in medicine.
